item.title: By: Jay
item.dc:creator: Jay
item.description: What is the actual size of these 17's? I'm looking into Rota Slipstreams (look almost identical to the regamasters) for now but I'm not sure if I want to go 17's or 18's I was hoping to put some meaty tires on without stretching the tires so not sure if the 17's or 18's would better suit my daily/road course use? Any thoughts?
item.content:encoded:
What is the actual size of these 17’s?
I’m looking into Rota Slipstreams (look almost identical to the regamasters) for now but I’m not sure if I want to go 17’s or 18’s
I was hoping to put some meaty tires on without stretching the tires so not sure if the 17’s or 18’s would better suit my daily/road course use? Any thoughts?

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: Perfect. I'm diggin' the tire size you went with too. "Slamtown"'s overrated. :P I can say that this particular FD holds true to this equation: function = form. And I promise I'm not sucking up to you. haha
item.content:encoded: Perfect. I’m diggin’ the tire size you went with too. “Slamtown”‘s overrated. :P I can say that this particular FD holds true to this equation: function = form. And I promise I’m not sucking up to you. haha
